lead_paragraph: American Varvara Lepchenko is clear to play again after she was found to shoulder "no fault or negligence" for an anti-doping rule violation, the International Tennis Federation (ITF) said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: ITF Clears Lepchenko Following Meldonium Explanation
headline.main: ITF Clears Lepchenko Following Meldonium Explanation
